attributes.action: Make Sanitary Products Free for Women and Girls
attributes.additional_details: As explained above, I want to make sure no girl or woman is caught feeling uncomfortable, embarrassed or absent from school just because of Period poverty.
attributes.background: I want to make sure no girl or woman is stuck without the necessary products and hygiene to deal with them. 50% of girls and women miss school and work because of periods; mainly because they don’t have access the sanitary products they need.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Fund free feminine hygiene products: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597571

Require sanitary products are made available in all public and workplace toilets: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606807
